Scripts.OnUpdate: if BigDebuffs.test then return end if ( GameTooltip:IsOwned(self) ) then if ( self.isBossBuff ) then GameTooltip:SetUnitBuffByAuraInstanceID(self:GetParent().displayedUnit, self.auraInstanceID, self.filter); else GameTooltip:SetUnitDebuffByAuraInstanceID(self:GetParent().displayedUnit, self.auraInstanceID, self.filter); end end
